Notes: A small variant of Bowser that lies down on the ground. When attacked, he will stand up and get angry at the player. Unlike most NPCs, it cannot be talked to at all.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated. A bit buggy because it will always have appeared even if the switch is deactivated. Deactivating the switch again will fix this, though.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: This object will not pause its movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc.

MarioFaceShipNpcRegister.Description: This object can be registered to a Starship Mario NPC appearance event.

SearchTurtle.Description: Red Koopa Shells and Gold Shells home in on this object.

YoshiLockOnTarget.Description: This object can be targeted by Yoshi.
